event.title: established a farmstead near present-day Jamestown in 1762

data.event: Among the original settlers was James Mendenhall, who established a farmstead near present-day Jamestown in 1762.
Though Mendenhall moved to Georgia in 1775, his son George remained, and by 1816, he founded the village of Jamestown in honor of his father.
Though Mendenhall moved to Georgia in 1775, his son George remained, and by 1816, he founded the village of Jamestown in honor of his father.

event.title: Today, High Point City Lake is situated

data.event: Today, High Point City Lake is situated where the original family farmhouse and land was located.
